name: W Miami
description: Own the moment at W Miami. Our luxury hotel in Brickell, Miami, has redefined the travel experience in Florida. No matter the reason for your stay, our 4-star hotel is the centerpiece of Miami's Wall Street and offers prime venues for your next Miami meeting or event. Our hotel rooms feature floor-to-ceiling windows framing views of the city or Miami River, marble bathrooms with W signature bath amenities and comfortable interiors designed in the Hollywood Regency style. After settling into your luxury hotel room, bask in the Florida sun and take in views of Miami as you sip cocktails in our 15th-floor pool. Dine on international cuisine set against panoramic Miami views at ADDIKT, our signature restaurant. Work off the extra calories at FIT®, our state-of-the-art fitness center, before exploring attractions in Miami, Florida. After a lively day exploring the city or conducting business, indulge in spa services at Iconbrickell Spa, showcasing a water lounge, a steam room and a sauna.Marriott

name: Aloft Miami Airport
description: Celebrate your style at Aloft Miami Airport, a hip new hotel that's only 15 minutes from Miami International Airport (MIA). We offer easy-breezy access to hotspots like Little Havana, Coral Gables, Coconut Grove, Downtown, The Art District, and South Beach. Meet & mingle with friends at our W XYZ bar, grab a sweet, savory, or healthy snack from re:fuel by Aloft, our 24/7 pantry, or play in our re:mix lounge. Plus, you can always stay connected with free hotel-wide wired and wireless High Speed Internet Access! Breeze into one of our Aloft rooms, featuring our ultra-comfortable signature bed, walk-in shower, custom amenities by Bliss® Spa, and more. Our plug & play connectivity station charges all your electronics and links to the 42” LCD TV to maximize work and play.Marriott

name: Miami Marriott Biscayne Bay
description: Miami Marriott Biscayne Bay offers 360 degrees of stunning views. From mornings on your private balcony to exploring Miami’s dynamic neighborhoods, to evenings at the Adrienne Arsht Center for the Performing Arts or a Miami Heat game at the Miami-Dade arena — it’s all just steps away. A newly added fifth-floor rooftop adds a one-of-a-kind backdrop of the bay and city. Meetings become memorable in our 20,000 square feet of stylish meeting space with floor-to-ceiling windows. A perfect wrap to the day with colleagues and friends is found at our waterfront restaurant Gold Coast Kitchen + Cocktails featuring fresh local flavors with a seafood-focused menu and citrus-based craft cocktails. Our newly opened first-floor M Club offers an exclusive way to recharge. Enjoy an invigorating weekend getaway, a relaxing stop on your way to cruising the Caribbean, or an extra day for play after a conference at our Waterfront Hotel in Miami.Marriott

name: Four Seasons Hotel Miami
description: Located above trendy Brickell Avenue, it's here where you will find the best of both big city adventure and tropical paradise, where a two-acre sun-kissed sanctuary overlooks the city's fashionable art, dining, and entertainment scenes all minutes from its doorstep A flat-screen cable TV, marble private bathroom, and a city or bay view are featured in all rooms. Four Seasons Hotel Miami also provides a seating area and desk with ergonomic chair. When guests are not in of the 2 outdoor pools, they can enroll in fitness classes like cycling or yoga. Access to free Wi-Fi, a hot tub, and sauna are provided to all Four Seasons Hotel guests. Edge, Steak & Bar features contemporary American cuisine from locally sourced seafood and vegetables to steaks in a dining room, bar, and outdoor terrace. Bahía offers poolside dining and beverages. Guests will find a variety of boutiques and eateries within 2 miles of the hotel at Bayside Marketplace. American Airlines Arena is 2 miles away.

name: Yve Hotel Miami
description: Strategically located in the middle of the city, this 3-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Miami. It is close to the area's tourist attractions and is minutes on foot from Bayfront Park Metromover Station. This modern hotel provides a range of facilities, including valet parking, an exhibit space and meeting rooms. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. The rooms are air conditioned and include bottled water, a laptop safe and a private bathroom. They each offer an alarm clock, a desk and an in-room safe. YVE Hotel Miami houses a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to relax of an evening. Lunch and dinner are served daily at Biscayne Boulevard. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. The area surrounding YVE Hotel Miami has a range of restaurants and cafés. Icon Brickell, Miami Convention Center and American Airlines Arena are each within walking distance.Revato

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Miami Aventura
description: Expect polished and modern elegance at AC Hotel Miami Aventura. Our luxury hotel is only steps away from world class shopping and dining options at Aventura Mall the vibrancy of Gulfstream Park Racecourse and Casino and premier events held at Hard Rock Stadium, South Beach and the Wynwood art scene. The beaches of Sunny Isles are a short drive away. Settle into our sleek rooms with European inspired decor and complimentary WiFi and flexible workstations for hitting deadlines. Our daily breakfasts at AC Kitchen will kick start your morning with freshly baked croissants and artisan cured meats and assorted quiches. Unwind in the evening at the AC Lounge with our unique tapas menu and signature cocktails. With our spacious and upscale event venues your colleagues and loved ones will be in awe with custom catering options to complement your conference or reception. Visit our upper deck pool and high tech fitness center to rejuvenate your body and spirit while taking in breathtaking skyline views.Marriott

name: Sheraton Miami Airport Hotel & Executive Meeting Center
description: Come in for the smoothest of landings at Sheraton Miami Airport Hotel & Executive Meeting Center. Your adventure begins the moment your plane touches down and you step onto our free shuttle service, running every 15 minutes 24-hours a day, to and from nearby Miami International Airport. Once you have arrived at our hotel you will find attractions moments from our doorstep, including Little Havana and Marlins Park. If exploring Miami is not on your agenda, there's no better feeling than retreating to the comfort of our pet-friendly hotel rooms featuring free Wi-Fi, marble bathrooms and room service. Our outdoor pool and 24-hour fitness center ensure your workout never has to miss a beat. Satisfy your appetite at one of our two superb hotel restaurants. Additionally, we offer 17 event rooms, perfect for any meeting or special occasion. Whether you are traveling for business or fun, Sheraton Miami Airport Hotel & Executive Meeting Center will provide the professional service and thoughtful amenities you deserve.Marriott

name: Hilton Miami Downtown
description: Enjoy panoramic views of Biscayne Bay from the recently renovated Hilton Miami Downtown hotel. Discover miles of white sandy beaches and South Beach entertainment only minutes away. The Hilton Miami Downtown hotel is conveniently located only 15 minutes from Miami International Airport (MIA) and five minutes from the Port of Miami. Experience all that the Downtown Miami performing arts district has to offer including Coconut Grove and the famous Miracle Mile, Miami Beach, Bayside Marketplace, South Beach, Wynwood Arts District, and Kaseya Center. Plunge into the outdoor rooftop pool and admire the Miami skyline view. Enjoy your favorite frozen cocktail or a casual lunch poolside at CityVu Pool Bar. Brisa Bistro offers exotic cuisine with an international influence. Hold your next conference or business meeting at the Hilton Miami Downtown hotel in 45, 000 sq. ft. of function space including one of the largest ballrooms (17, 000 sq. ft.) in the Miami area. Featuring the latest technology and flexible space, the Hilton Miami Downtown hotel is also ideally located for several major company offices.Hilton

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Miami Airport
description: Discover the ideal choice for extended stays in Miami, FL, in our modern, fully equipped suites with expanded amenities at Residence Inn Miami Airport. Our pet-friendly airport hotel in Miami, Florida, boasts a superb location near the Miami International Airport (MIA), LoanDepot Park, Magic City Casino and Little Havana. Start your day with our complimentary breakfast and squeeze in a workout at our hotel's fitness center before exploring Miami. Then, soak up the sun at our outdoor pool. If you're visiting for business, host your event or meeting in our versatile venues. At the end of your day, retreat to spacious, well-appointed suites with pillowtop mattresses, complimentary Wi-Fi, full kitchens and separate living areas. No matter how long you're in Miami, let us ensure you enjoy your stay at our extended-stay Miami hotel near the airport.Marriott

name: Hilton Garden Inn Miami Dolphin Mall
description: Welcome to Hilton Garden Inn Miami Dolphin Mall, conveniently situated adjacent to Dolphin Mall, Ikea, & Miami International Mall. An ideal overnight stay destination for pre & post cruise travelers. Our unique location places us minutes away from Miami International Airport, Florida International University, Doral Business Park, MIA Landings, Downtown Miami, & the Art Deco District. Bright and functional, our guest rooms offer complimentary wifi, a microwave, mini-fridge and 42-inch HDTV. Refresh in the swimming pool or energize in the fitness center. Enjoy a delicious twist on classic American and Latin dishes, cocktails, & craft brews at our Flamingo Grille and Lounge. In a hurry? Purchase sundries and snacks in the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry. An ideal venue for business and social events, this Miami hotel has 5,500 sq. ft. of versatile event space that can accommodate large productions and focused meetings.Hilton

name: Hyatt House Miami Airport
description: This Miami hotel is 1.9 mi from the Miami International Airport. The hotel offers a fully equipped kitchen in every suite and features an airport and local transfer service within 1.9 mi. Suites at Hyatt house Miami Airport include a 32-inch flat-screen TV. The suites also have a seating area and free WiFi. The Hyatt house Miami offers a free breakfast buffet and grocery services. Guests can work out in the gym or swim in the outdoor pool. Located on site, H Bar serves cocktails, desserts, and snacks for guests looking to socialize. The hotel is less than 15 minutes' drive of the American Airlines Arena, which features concerts and basketball games. Coral Gables is 6.8 mi away.

name: Hyatt Regency Miami
description: Overlooking Biscayne Bay and connected to the Miami Convention Center, this hotel offers stunning views of the city as well as easy access to attractions such as the Port of Miami, which is 8 minutes' drive from the accommodations. Hyatt Regency Miami features a heated outdoor pool and a fully equipped fitness center with cardiovascular equipment and free weights. After playing a game of golf on a nearby course, guests can relax in a guestroom with a comfortable bed and watch the flat-screen TV. Riverview Bar and Grill at the Miami Hyatt Regency serves an extensive buffet breakfast, in addition to Latin cuisine and fresh fish for lunch and dinner. In the evening, guests can sip on a cocktail in the relaxing Riverview Bar & Grill. Guestrooms come equipped with an en suite safe, private bathroom, and a desk. Additional amenities include free WiFi and ironing facilities. Miami Beach is 15 minutes' drive from the property while Vizcaya Museum & Gardens is located 6 minutes' drive from the property. Miami International Airport is 9 minutes' drive.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Miami Airport West/Doral
description: Whether you're in Doral, FL for a quick layover or an extended business trip, find everything you need to move forward at Courtyard Miami Airport West/Doral. Enjoy effortless arrivals and departures with our convenient free shuttle between the hotel and nearby MIA Airport. Attractions near our hotel include Miami Springs, Dolphin Mall, aviation trainings, the Port of Miami and downtown Doral. Delight in delectable American cuisine, Starbucks® coffee and refreshing cocktails at The Bistro, open for breakfast and dinner. Our 24-hour convenience store, The Market, is your go-to for snacks and beverages. Maintain your active lifestyle with a heart-pumping workout in our hotel fitness center before cooling off in our sparkling outdoor pool. Spacious, pet-friendly hotel rooms and suites feature comfortable bedding, free high-speed Wi-Fi, large work desks and ergonomic chairs for a productive Doral getaway.Marriott

name: Courtyard by Marriott Miami Airport
address: 1201 NW Le Jeune Road, Miami, FL 33126
description: Book your home away from home at Courtyard Miami Airport, our hotel in Miami, FL, featuring redesigned amenities and rooms. Our modern hotel near Miami International Airport welcomes guests to Miami, Florida, with free airport shuttles and a lobby full of cutting-edge technology and private media pods. Along with stimulating hotel amenities, guests enjoy easy access to Dolphin Mall, Marlins Park and nightlife in Coral Gables. Return from a long day downtown to an outdoor pool, whirlpool spa and sleek fitness center with cardio machines and free weights. Connect with colleagues using our free Wi-Fi and network at Champions Sports Bar, our on-site restaurant serving regional beer and American classics. Visit Miami for business or social functions and plan your next event in versatile venues with seating for up to 140 guests, all at our hotel in Miami, Florida, near the airport. Restful nights begin from the pillowtop bed of your hotel room or suite. We look forward to welcoming you to Courtyard Miami Airport.Marriott

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Miami International Airport
address: 3974 Northwest South River Drive, Miami, FL 33142
description: Welcome to Embassy Suites Hotel - Miami International Airport, a proud member of the Florida GREEN Lodging Program. Our Miami Florida airport hotel offers great year round weather and fantastic Summer Family Vacation Packages and Specials. Our Miami airport hotel is conveniently located just a half mile from MIA and we offer complimentary drop-off and pick-up airport shuttle service. Miami has a diverse and rich culture and our hotel is proud to be a part of it. All major Miami attractions are close by our hotel including the Miami Seaquarium, Jungle Island, historic Coral Gables, Miami's trendy South Beach and of course, the Port of Miami for all your cruise departures. Individual Transfers to the Port of Miami are also available for a Nominal Fee. Reserve your seats upon check-in at our Front Desk! Many of our Miami airport hotel guests experience the following attractions during their stay with us: The Port of Miami for all CRUISE departures! Fantastic Miami Shopping Malls, Outdoor Markets and upscale street venues, The best Golf in Florida at Miami Golf Courses, Miami Spa Services In-Suite, Miami Sports Arena's including homes of the Dolphins, Heat and Marlins! The hip sophistication and international flair of South Beach, Miami Museums, the Miami Zoo and Florida National Parks. Our Miami airport hotel has something to offer travelers from around the world. Miami Florida is an international gateway for businesses, health industries, world commerce and has also become a leading destination for the entertainment industry. South Beach is known around the world as a beacon for international musicians, artists and dance companies. South Beach and downtown Miami are home to some of the top clubs, discothèques and art galleries in the world. Below is a list of just some of the major corporations that have made Miami their home base: Lennar Corporation, The University of Miami, Carnival Cruise Lines Corporation, Burger King Corporation, World Fuel Services, Southern Wine & Spirits Corporation. As we mentioned above, you can't beat the weather in Miami. Our average temperature is 75.9 C and although it gets warmer in the summer months, Miami is a lush, tropical paradise at the southern tip of the Florida peninsula with Key Biscayne just a short drive away and Key West just a three hour drive from our hotel. When you need it bad, we've got it good! Welcome to Miami!Hilton

name: Hilton Miami Airport Blue Lagoon
description: The Hilton Miami Airport Blue Lagoon in Miami, Florida is the premier full service 'resort style' hotel near Miami International Airport. We are a preferred choice for business travel, Miami vacations, and convention guests. This beautiful hotel is situated on a private peninsula in Blue Lagoon and is only a nine-minute complimentary airport shuttle ride from Miami International Airport. Our convenient Miami hotel location is near a number of exciting local attractions including: South Beach, Downtown Miami, Coconut Grove, Coral Gables, Port of Miami (Cruise Port), Miami Beach Convention Center, Brickell Avenue Business District, American Airlines Arena (home of the Miami Heat), Little Havana, Wynwood, Hard Rock Stadium (home of the Miami Dolphins and University of Miami Hurricanes), Marlins Stadium, Florida International University Stadium (home of the Golden Panthers), and Dolphin Mall. The hotel boasts 508 guest rooms including 80 suites that overlook a natural lagoon and the sparkling skyline of downtown Miami, Florida. A wide selection of hotel facilities and services are also available for your enjoyment. Guests enjoy sunbathing in and around the large pool, relaxing in the whirlpool and exercising in the fitness center (featuring Peloton bikes, cardio, resistance and free weights), tennis and basketball courts, and scenic walking/jogging path. This hotel also features international cuisine in its Coral Café restaurant, premium liquors and tropical beverages in its indoor and outdoor bars, Herb n Kitchen (Grab & Go), and Room Service. Meeting planners and attendees will love the hotel's 30,000 sq. ft. of function space, on-site business center, and dedicated event staff members. We cater to 10 – 1,000 people. Our hotel provides real-time flight information for our guests' convenience via a “live” flight display board in the lobby. Several exciting and famous Florida attractions located nearby enrich the Miami experience: Jungle Island, Vizcaya Museum and Gardens, Florida Everglades, The Miami Seaquarium, Miami Metro Zoo, Adrienne Arsht Center for the Performing Arts, Actor's Playhouse, Venetian Pool, Key Biscayne, Homestead Speedway, Historic Art Deco District and Bayside Marketplace If traveling on business, our hotel is located near Miami International Airport in the heart of Waterford Blue Lagoon Corporate Business Park, home to a number of companies: Burger King, Hewlett Packard, Oracle, SAP, Visa International, Federal Express, Nokia, Toyota, Caterpillar, Johnson & Johnson, Sony. Additional Information: This premier full service hotel is just 9 minutes from the Miami International Airport for business pleasure.Hilton

name: Sentral Wynwood
description: Sentral Wynwood has been featured in Forbes, NYTimes & Conde Nast, and has hosted over 200k guests in 1,000+ spaces with an average rating of 4.8 stars.As the newest hotel addition, Sentral Wynwood boasts a range of trendy rooms—from artsy studios to unique two bedroom suites with full kitchens and living rooms.Enjoy the lively atmosphere of our rooftop pool or break a sweat in our fitness center.Sentral Wynwood is the perfect place for large groups of families and friends to enjoy curated apartment-style living with hotel amenities.Guests are a block away from Wynwood Walls and minutes away to several art galleries.This unit features:688 square feet (average) Bedroom: Queen bedDen: Queen bedLiving Room: Sofa bedThe Space:**As this is a brand-new property, renderings are provided to show a sample of the building and unit plans.Final furniture and in-unit finishes may vary,but will be of similar quality and aesthetic to the images shown.**-En-suite laundry-Fully equipped kitchen -Towels & linen provided-Complimentary bathroom essentials-High-speed internet-Designer furniture -Original artworkGuest Access:Sentral Wynwood is equipped with a clubroom, a 24hour concierge, and our fitness center, making it easy to stay active even while you're away from home. Take a dip and relax at our rooftop pool fit with lounge chairs and a stunning view.Interaction with Guests:We’re there when you need us, gone when you don't. Our experienced staff is always ready to make your stay with us as delightful as possible.The Neighborhood:Wynwood is an outdoor art exhibit at city scale, unrivaled in its blend of well-known names and up-and-coming artists. Home to the famous Wynwood Wall, over 200 distinct street murals vibrantly revives former factories and warehouses. There is also plenty to see, eat, drink, and explore with over 200 local bars and restaurants. Nearby parks include Roberto Clemente Park, Rainbow Village Park and Robert E Lee Park.Getting Around:Sentral Wynwood is rated as a Walker's Paradise (96) on Walkscore making daily errands a breeze by foot. Parking is also available at the property's garage for an additional fee of $25 per night (max of one car per stay) and based on availability. Ride hailing services like Uber and Lyft are also readily accessible. Average Travel Times (by car):Miami International Airport: 20mins Downtown Miami: 10-15mins Miami Beach: 20-25mins Hard Rock Stadium: 30-40mins Other Things to Note:**Disclaimer: Construction is expected to be completed Jan 2020. We will do our best to minimize the construction's impact during your stay and are readily available should there be any questions and or concerns. As this is a brand-new property, renderings are provided to show a sample of the building and unit plans. Final furniture and in-unit finishes may vary, but will be of similar quality and aesthetic to the images shown.**Check-in Age:Guests must be at least 21 years of age to check in. Pool Hours: Daily 7AM - 10PMSmoking Fee:100% non-smoking hotel. A fee of up to $500 USD will be assessed for smoking in the hotel, including the rooftop and terraces.Please ask the Front Desk for locations of designated outdoor smoking areas.Limited Housekeeping Service:At Sentral, we're committed to sustainability and an eco-friendly service offering. Our team maintains a high standard of cleaning and will always clean your apartment before check-in and after check-out.Additional cleanings are at request/based on availability and mayExpedia

name: Mandarin Oriental, Miami
description: With stunning views of the Miami skyline and Biscayne Bay, this hotel on Brickell Key Island offers luxurious spa services. The Shops at Mary Brickell Village are located just 3117 feet away from the Mandarin Oriental, Miami. A balcony, flat-screen cable TV with a DVD player, and iPod docking station are included in all guest rooms. Guests can enjoy a well-stocked mini-bar, evening turndown service, and marble bathroom with walk-in shower and separate bathtub. Mandarin Oriental, Miami offers an infinity-edge outdoor pool with butler service as well as a state-of-the-art fitness center. After a yoga class or personal training session, guests can relax with a massage in the full-service spa. La Mar by Gaston Acurio prepares Peruvian dishes while MO Bar + Lounge paires classic cocktails with a light fare menu. Miami city center is only 3 minutes' drive away from the Mandarin Oriental hotel, and South Beach district is located 6.3 mi away. The Wynwood Arts District is 3.4 mi away, and Coconut Grove is 13 minutes' drive from the property.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Miami Wynwood Design District
description: Hampton Inn & Suites Miami Midtown, a new hotel in the up-and-coming arts district, is just 5 miles from downtown and 8 miles from Miami International Airport. Our location also offers easy access to Interstates 95 and 195. Get a fresh view of your surroundings from inside the hotel through the local artists’ paintings on display. Our hotel delivers a vibrant Miami, Florida stay experience – from our friendly multi-lingual staff to our year-round outdoor pool. Enjoy complimentary access to our business center and fitness room, open when you need to print a job after 5pm or get an early morning workout. Free coffee, tea and WiFi are available in the lobby any time. For a training seminar or a small family gathering, our Dolphin and Marlin meeting rooms accommodate up to 62 people. Join us for a free hot breakfast, including kid-friendly options, every morning of your stay. If you’re in a hurry on a weekday, grab a complimentary On the Run™ Breakfast bag. Lunch and dinner are only a 3-minute walk away to local Miami restaurants. Unwind in your guest room using free WiFi while sitting on the ergonomic chair or reclining on your clean and fresh Hampton bed®. All of our rooms include a mini-fridge and coffeemaker, 40-inch LCD TV plus a work desk. Upgrade to a suite for a view, a separate living area and a sofa bed, a microwave and a wet bar. Accessible rooms are available, too.Hilton

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Miami Aventura Mall
address: 19900 West Country Club Drive, Aventura, FL 33180
description: Explore South Florida in style while enjoying a Residence Inn Miami Aventura Mall hotel suite. Located near Gulfstream Park, our hotel, close to Aventura Mall, makes exploring Miami's top attractions and beaches easy. Choose from our studio, one- and two-bedroom hotel suites and enjoy the comforts of home, like complimentary Wi-Fi, spacious living areas and luxurious bedding. Start your day with our complimentary hot breakfast buffet or make the most of your suite's kitchen to prepare a special homemade meal. Once you've refueled and recharged, stop by our fitness center to work on your cardio. Next, take a refreshing dip in the heated outdoor pool at our hotel in Aventura, surrounded by cozy lounge chairs and swaying palm trees. Hosting an event? With four stylish meeting spaces offering audiovisual equipment, our hotel accommodates everything from business conferences to quinceañeras. So whether you're visiting the beach or going on a cruise, find your home at Residence Inn Miami Aventura Mall.Marriott

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Miami Doral
description: Your modern and vibrant DoubleTree by Hilton Miami Doral, FL is located in the heart of Dorals' bustling business district. Featuring local photos of Miami that embraces the culture and area, your full-service DoubleTree by Hilton Miami Doral, FL was designed with all of the modern comforts that today's traveler expects. This brand new hotel is just nine miles from Miami International Airport, two miles from Dolphin Mall and within walking distance from Miami International Mall. Downtown Miami, South Beach, the Art Deco District and Lincoln Road are all within easy reach. Our hotel offers a local shuttle within a five mile radius. We’ll greet you at check-in with a warm DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie. Feel at home in a guest room with complimentary WiFi, satellite TV, a mini-fridge, ergonomic workspace, and plenty of outlets to charge your devices. Our suites offer a separate living area, larger bathroom and second TV. A wealth of amenities await you, including a state-of-the-art fitness center, outdoor pool and terrace with bar. Dine at Rocio with its creative cuisine for all taste buds, or enjoy your favorite beer or cocktail Antojitos Lounge. Grab a snack, sandwich and other fresh selections at Made Market. Our hotel features meeting space for any special event or conference and can accommodate up to 275 people.Hilton

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Doral Mall Area
description: Set a pace that suits you at the New Residence Inn by Marriott. Whether you're with us for a few days, a few weeks, or a few months, your daily routine matters. You'll thrive at Residence Inn with the conveniences you need. Like spacious kings and double queen studio, and one-bedroom suites with separate living and sleeping areas. A fully equipped kitchen ready for your favorite cuisine. Complimentary grocery delivery service to fill your refrigerator and satisfy cravings. Complimentary shuttle service to Miami International Airport from 9am - 5pm. Free Internet for connecting to work and the outside world. Free hot breakfast to start mornings off right. And, a fitness center for strengthening your body and soul. Relax and unwind when you want. And stay focused and productive when it's essential. At Residence Inn, we'll make sure you thrive during your stay.Marriott

name: SLS Brickell
description: At the center of it all SLS Brickell takes its standards of style, luxury and service to transform Downtown Miami skyline. A feast for the senses. A creative cocktail of sophistication and playfulness. A Hotel with elements of creativity and community featuring 124 rooms, world class décor by Philippe Starck, unforgettable dining by two award winning chefs, an incredible pool deck, exclusive access to SLS Collection and global concierge, SLS Brickell is an irresistible retreat in the city's center.accorhotels.com

name: The Setai, Miami Beach
description: Located directly on the beach in Miami’s famous Art Deco district, this resort offers yoga and tai-chi classes. Suites are furnished in Asian-style décor. Free WiFi and an iPod docking station are provided in every spacious suite at The Setai, Miami Beach. Rooms are equipped with espresso and coffee facilities along with a mini-bar. Miami Beach Setai features 3 infinity swimming pools and a business center. The on-site spa offers a number of massages and treatments, including a 60-minute Nepalese Body Polish. Concierges are available to provide recommendations. Guests can dine at 4 on-site restaurants including The Setai Grill, an American steakhouse serving Asian-inspired dishes. The Bar & Courtyard offers nightly drinks and snacks. Bayshore Golf Course is 1 mi from the resort. The Setai, Miami Beach is 1 mi from Lummus Park and 1050 feet from Bass Museum of Art.

name: Hotel Indigo Miami Brickell
description: Relax, work, and embrace the vibe of Miami at Hotel Indigo® Miami Brickell. Located in the upscale Brickell neighborhood, our hotel is steps from the Brickell City Centre with some of the best restaurants, bars, shopping, and entertainment. Ride the free Metromover or trolley to Miami attractions, including the Bayside Marketplace, Kaseya Center, and Adrienne Arsht Center for the Performing Arts. Miami Beach, Dolphin Mall, and the most beautiful beaches in South Florida are a quick trip on the Metrorail. Our Brickell hotel puts you near the Port of Miami and 20 minutes from Miami International Airport. Get the edge on business and enjoy local adventures at a uniquely Miami hotel with everything you need—meeting space, an outdoor pool, and a trendy neighborhood eatery.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove
description: Located in Miami, a few steps from Cocowalk Shopping Center, Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove has accommodations with free bikes, private parking, a fitness center and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi. The property provides evening entertainment and a concierge service. At the hotel, rooms contain a desk. Featuring a shared bathroom with a bath and free toiletries, certain accommodations at Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove also feature a sea view. The rooms have a safety deposit box. An American breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove has a terrace. Vizcaya Museum is 2.8 miles from the hotel, while University of Miami is 3.2 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 6.2 miles from Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove.

name: Hyatt Place Miami Airport-West/Doral
description: Our hotel near Miami Airport offers an array of services and features designed to meet the needs of travelers including free Wi-Fi. Enjoy our convenient location in the heart of Doral near CityPlace and within walking distance to eccentric restaurants, entertainment and shopping. A flat-screen TV, MP3 compatible radios, and small refrigerator are featured in all spacious suites at this Miami Hyatt Place West Doral. Extras include modern furnishings, towels, and linen. A business center and fitness center are on site for added convenience. The Miami Hyatt Place West Doral features a large variety of on-site dining options, including a 24-hour kitchen serving made-to-order dishes. The Gallery Cafe features Starbucks coffee drinks along with snacks. The hotel is 1 mi from Doral PGA Golf Course and 10 minutes' drive from Miami International Mall. A transfer service is offered to the Port of Miami, which is 3 mi away.

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Miami Airport West/Doral
description: Set a pace that suits you at Residence Inn by Marriott. Whether you're with us for a few days, a few weeks, or a few months, your daily routine matters. You'll thrive at Residence Inn with the conveniences you need. Like spacious studios, and one bedroom suites of either one king or two queen beds with separate living and sleeping areas. A fully equipped kitchen ready for your favorite cuisine. Complimentary grocery delivery service to fill your refrigerator and satisfy cravings. Free Internet for connecting to work and the outside world. Free hot breakfast to start mornings off right. And, a fitness center for strengthening your body and soul. Relax and unwind when you want. Stay focused and productive when it's essential. At Residence Inn, we'll make sure you thrive during your stay.Marriott

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami Dolphin Mall
description: Whether you’re staying in Miami for just a few nights or for much longer, you’ll discover your home away from home at the new Homewood Suites by Hilton® Miami Dolphin Mall. We are located adjacent to the Dolphin Mall, and less than one mile from the Miami International Mall – Miami’s premier retail destination. We are also within 4 miles of Doral and world class golf, and only 10 miles from Miami International Airport. The shopping, dining, attractions and entertainment of downtown are just 16.3 miles from our all-suite Miami hotel. Savor a free full, hot breakfast every morning, and unwind at the complimentary Wednesday evening social.* Settle into a stylish suite, offering everything you need to feel at home, including complimentary WiFi access, a work desk, an HDTV, plush bedding, and a full kitchen. Make the most of your leisure time at this extended-stay Miami hotel. Work out with the latest wellness technology in the expanded fitness center, swim in the sparkling outdoor pool, or top up your tan on the sun deck. Enjoy a farm to table selection of entrees and appetizers at The Flamingo Grille, which serves American classics influenced and inspired by the vibrant local flavors popular in Miami. With a 24-hour business center, and 5,500 square feet of conference space available in the attached Garden Inn, our hotel is an ideal base for meetings, training events and celebrations for up to 175 people. * Subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.Hilton

description: Located 11 minutes' drive from The Shops of Midtown Miami, Hyatt Place Miami Airport East offers accommodations in Miami. The hotel has an outdoor pool and terrace. Guests can enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant. Every room is equipped with a 42-inch flat-screen TV with satellite channels. This Miami Airport East Hyatt Place offers meeting and event space as well as an on-site fitness center. The 24/7 gallery serves American dishes, including a cheddar burgers, spinach salad, and turkey sandwiches. Marlins Park is 3.7 mi from Hyatt Place Miami Airport East, while Miracle Mile Miami is 3.7 mi from the property. The nearest airport is Miami Airport, 1.2 mi from Hyatt Place Miami Airport East.

description: Daily Resort Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: Guest internet access: beach services (2 chairs, 2 bottles of water, 1 umbrella, towels): 15% discount on Spa & Salon services: 2 in-room bottles of water: small sunblock: turndown services on request: Pressreader.Experience the beautiful Hilton Bentley Miami/South Beach hotel at world-famous 101 Ocean Drive of South Beach, Miami. Discover a luxurious beachfront paradise in an intimate, elegant world-class setting. The Hilton Bentley hotel offers a stellar walk-to-anything location in South Beach's 'Sofi', a refined and sophisticated enclave of Miami Beach. Guests are footsteps to Miami Beach's playground of the finest restaurants and nightlife, one mile away from Lincoln Road and the Miami Beach Convention Center, three miles away from the Port of Miami, and only seven miles from Miami International Airport. Relax in style in the amenity-rich suites of Hilton Bentley. Offering modern elegance, each of our studio, one-bedroom, two-bedroom and penthouse suites have been designed to exquisite detail. Enjoy contemporary European furnishings, Italian marble floors,50-inch LCD TVs, and stainless steel gourmet kitchens and kitchenettes. Experience the majestic views of the Atlantic Ocean and Miami Beach.Hilton

description: Staybridge Suites - Miami International Airport features air-conditioned rooms in Miami. With an outdoor swimming pool, the property also has a fitness center, as well as barbecue facilities. Miami International Airport is 1.2 mi from the property, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service. A continental breakfast is available daily at the hotel. All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a bath or shower and a hair dryer. All rooms feature a desk. An onsite bar and juice bar are provided for guests to enjoy. An evening reception with complimentary light fare, beer, and wine is offered Monday through Wednesday. Guests will find a 24-hour front desk, a business center and laundry service at the property. Complimentary shuttle service is offered to the Miami Intermodal Center, which is 1476 ft away. The property is 2.7 mi from Marlins Park and 3.7 mi from Miracle Mile Miami.

name: Sonesta Miami Airport
description: Just 2625 feet from Miami International Airport, Sonesta Miami Airport in Miami, Florida offers convenient services such as 24-hour airport shuttle service and Wi-Fi in all guest rooms. Sonesta Miami Airport features an outdoor pool. Guests can work out in the fitness center or be productive in the business center. Guests can enjoy their stay at this completely nonsmoking hotel. Cafe 950 at the Sonesta Miami Airport is open for breakfast, lunch. Guests can also enjoy the hotel's welcoming Buena Vista Lounge.

name: Springhill Suites Miami Downtown/Medical Center
description: In the heart of downtown, our Miami pet-friendly hotel places you just minutes away from Wynwood/Design District, Port of Miami, LoanDepot Park and walking distance to the University of Miami Hospital. Jump-start your day with a complimentary hot breakfast and join us for a perfect stay in Miami while you immerse yourself in the local culture by exploring art galleries and diverse restaurants. Take advantage of our covered parking garage while you explore Miami or during your Caribbean escape. For those visiting one of the five main medical centers or hospitals in the area, our complimentary shuttle can both drop off and pick up often. After a busy day out in the city, unwind at our 13Eleven restaurant or enjoy spending time on our outdoor terrace. Keep up with your workout routine in the outdoor pool and fitness center. End your evening by stretching out in one of our stylish, spacious, ultra comfortable suites with complimentary WiFi, mini-fridge, microwave, and extended living area.Marriott

name: Element Miami Doral
description: A contemporary haven amid Miami's vibrant cityscape, Element Miami Doral enjoys a prime location near popular South Florida attractions. Stylish studios and suites offer fully-equipped kitchens, pillowtop mattresses, work desks, and much more. Our eco-friendly accommodations provide a tranquil retreat, conveniently situated near US Southern Command and Florida International University, and close to the airport. Start your day with a complimentary breakfast, setting the perfect tone for exploration and relaxation. Discover museums and indulge in shopping sprees at Dolphin Mall and International Mall. Miami's beaches beckon, inviting you to bask in the warm embrace of the ocean. Afterward, cool off with a dip in our outdoor pool. At 107 Steak & Bar, savor delectable cuts of prime beef and fusion cuisine. Elevate your events in versatile spaces, perfect for meetings, weddings, and private parties. Experience the best of Miami at Element Miami Doral, your home base for unforgettable adventures.Marriott

name: The Gabriel Miami Downtown, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Daily Mandatory Destination Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: Premium internet access: $25 food and beverage credit for use in all hotel outlets: shuttle transfer to the Gabriel South Beach, including beach access and two chairs. Experience the essence of downtown Miami, FL at The Gabriel, Curio Collection by Hilton. Our Biscayne Boulevard hotel puts you in the perfect spot for gorgeous bay views from any of our 85 guest room balconies and the 14th floor pool deck. Kaseya Center, Adrienne Arsht Center, Frost Science Museum, and the Perez Art Museum are less than a 10-minute walk away. The hotel is a short drive to South Beach, Brickell, and the Wynwood Arts and Design district. Conveniently located near Miami International Airport, Port Miami terminal, and public transit, we make getting around a breeze. We also provide valet parking. Sip a signature cocktail from Bella's Bar poolside or try unique cuisine from The Gabriel Restaurant, open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The sophisticated third-floor Library Lounge features refreshments and vibrant books about music, art, film, and culture. Burn calories while gazing out at Biscayne Bay from our 24-hour, state-of-the-art fitness facility. We also offer complimentary poolside yoga classes every weekend. All of our guest rooms and suites are spacious and have views through floor-to-ceiling windows and smart tech, including integrated digital media with high-definition sound, internet, and a safe with laptop charging.Hilton

name: Biltmore Hotel
description: Boasting amenities including an 18-hole golf course and a full-service spa, this historic resort in Coral Gables, Florida is just 4 miles from Miami International Airport. Brickell City Center is 6.2 mi away. University of Miami is 1.6 miles away Robes and linens are offered in each room at the Biltmore Hotel. A 65-inch flat-screen TV and telephone are also included. The Biltmore Hotel offers 10 lighted tennis courts, an outdoor 2300 square yard swimming pool with cabanas, and an on-site fitness center. In addition, the hotel offers over 150 acres of lush tropical landscape and spacious meeting and banquet facilities. Guests staying at the Biltmore can enjoy a variety of gourmet dining options, including contemporary French cuisine at Palme d'Or and classic Italian dishes at Fontana. The hotel also offers classic pub fare at the 19th Hole restaurant and a Sunday Champagne Brunch. Shopping and dining at Village of Merrick Park are just 1.8 miles from this hotel. Guests will be 5.1 miles from Vizcaya Museum and Gardens, and 3.3 miles from coconut Grove.

name: Acqualina Resort & Residences On The Beach
address: 17875 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: Reminiscent of a Mediterranean villa, Acqualina invites you to step into a world of luxury with unprecedented accommodations and service, world-class dining destinations with four restaurants including the new Avra Miami and Il Mulino New York, three oceanfront swimming pools, Acqualina Spa, spacious meeting rooms, and AcquaMarine, an innovative marine biology-based children's program. Recent introductions to the resort include a new Adult Pool experience and a Floridian-meets-Mediterranean menu at the beachside Costa Grill. The luxury seaside haven is located on 4.5 beachfront acres in Miami’s Sunny Isles Beach, and conveniently located between Miami International Airport and Fort Lauderdale Airport. Designed to offer a sense of modern luxury with classic furnishings and finishes, the richly appointed accommodations are the hallmark of the guest experience at Acqualina. Offerings include 54 guest rooms and 44 suites, all offering expansive floor plans and breathtaking views from private balconies. One, Two and Three Bedroom Oceanfront Suites are available. Only 10 minute drive from the Acqualina Resort are the luxury shops and restaurants of Bal Harbor. The vibrant South Beach area as well as the legendary Art Deco district is also within driving distance. A family owned and operated property, Acqualina is a recipient of the coveted Forbes Travel Guide Five-Star Award for both the hotel and spa, as well as the AAA Five Diamond Award. Acqualina is also named the #1 Best Resort in the U.S. and the #1 Best Hotel in the U.S. by U.S. News & World Report.USA Today named Acqualina Best Destination Resort in the U.S.

name: Hotel Croydon
description: Hotel Croydon Mid Beach is situated in Miami Beach and is close to the area's popular attractions. It also provides a rooftop terrace, free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool. The hotel has a gym with a swimming pool. Facilities include facial and body treatments, plus an executive floor and an express check-in and check-out feature. Hotel Croydon Mid Beach provides air conditioned rooms with luxury toiletries, a mini bar and an iPod docking station. They each offer an in-room safe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Those in search of a meal and wanting to stay close by needn't look any further than the hotel's in-house restaurant, which is ideally available each day for lunch and dinner. In the evening, guests are welcome to wind down in the lounge bar. Hotel Croydon Mid Beach is within a short walk of The Forge. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Miami Beach.Revato

name: SERENA Hotel Aventura Miami, Tapestry Collection by Hilton
description: The SERENA Hotel Aventura is moments away from world class shopping at Aventura Mall and neighbors to Gulf Stream Park and Casino, where you can enjoy live horse races, fine restaurants, gambling and shopping. We are located in the epicenter of the Aventura Medical District and the nearest hotel to the Aventura Hospital. Enjoy refined contemporary rooms and suites in a relaxed atmosphere. A portion of our suites feature separate living and sleeping areas featuring including a fully equipped kitchen. We offer a full restaurant and bar, a conference room, fitness center and rooftop swimming pool. SERENA is derived from the Latin word serenus, meaning clear, tranquil, or serene. Whether you’ve spent your day under the sun, shopping or working you can unplug and arrive at your place of tranquility.Hilton

name: Courtyard by Marriott Miami Beach South Beach
description: Discover all you need to energize your Miami Beach adventure or slow to a leisurely pace at Courtyard Miami Beach South Beach. Positioned on vibrant Washington Ave. in the Art Deco District, our hotel immerses you in the heart of Miami Beach's iconic scene. Enjoy contemporary amenities featuring a delectable American eatery, convenient valet parking, complimentary Wi-Fi and a Starbucks® café. Our intimate event venue offers tailored dining choices and advanced AV tools perfect for executive meetings and special gatherings in Miami Beach. Refresh in our rooftop pool or stay fit in our 24/7 fitness center equipped with state-of-the-art cardio machines and free weights. As the day winds down, retire to your pet-friendly hotel suite with separate living and sleeping areas, compact fridges, premium bedding, well-appointed workspaces, flat-screen TVs and chic décor. Whether your visit is for business or leisure, craft a memorable stay at Courtyard Miami Beach South Beach.Marriott

The hotel offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk. Every kitchen at Extended Stay America - Miami is equipped with a stovetop, microwave and a fridge. The hotel also provides guests with laundry and ironing facilities as well as upgraded bedding with extra pillows. Free grab-and-go breakfast including breakfast bars, muffins, hot cereal, coffee and tea is served every morning. Weekly housekeeping services are provided for free and daily provided for a fee. Towels and linen can be exchanged at the front desk. The property offers free onsite parking. An attraction within close proximity to the hotel is the Dolphin Mall.

Breakfast is on us.Hilton

description: Nestled in the chic Brickell neighborhood near Port of Miami, Atwell Suites Miami Brickell offers an unparalleled experience, close to beautiful beaches and top attractions. Discover trendy rooftop restaurants and bars. Shop upscale boutiques in Brickell City Centre. Enjoy live music at Bayside Marketplace on Biscayne Bay and soak up the sun at Miami's iconic South Beach. Visit the Perez Art Museum, explore the vibrant culture of Little Havana, or catch an exciting Miami Marlins game at LoanDepot Park. Balance work and play in our spacious pet-friendly suites with free Wi-Fi and standing desks. Collaborate in our shared workspaces and bookable meeting room. Satiate anytime cravings at our 24/7 Market and Beverage Station and enjoy our paid bar with cocktails and shareable small plates. For an authentic taste of Miami, dine at Mosaico Kitchen & Bar located in our shared space with Hotel Indigo. From free breakfast to rooftop pool and fitness studio, indulge in the perfect blend of comfort and convenience at Atwell Suites Miami Brickell, where your Miami adventure awaits!IHG Hotels & Resorts

description: Find something delightfully different at AC Hotel Miami Beach, located on Collins Ave in the heart of sunny Miami Beach. Our hotel near Miami International Airport offers the perfect place to relax and soak up some Miami sunshine, with two beach chairs included in the hotel’s amenity fee. Explore the Miami Beach boardwalk within walking distance of our hotel, or wander through the boutique shops at nearby Lincoln Road Mall. Start your day with the European-inspired breakfast at our hotel restaurant, AC Kitchen, followed by Beach Yoga. At the end of the day, visit Gin & Collins for delicious tapas, signature cocktails and international wines. Our 24-hour fitness center helps you stay active with an assortment of free weights and cardio machines, while our rooftop pool boasts spectacular views of Miami Beach. Relax in your suite, featuring either floor-to-ceiling windows or a private balcony. You work hard, so play hard at AC Hotel Miami Beach.Marriott

Centrally located 15 minutes from Miami International Airport and within 10 minutes to Dolphin Mall and soon to come American Dream Mall, this hotel is tailor-made for extended-stay travelers. All 123 suites have all the comforts of a home, and include fully equipped kitchens, in-room wireless WIFI, and incredible beds to ensure you get a great night's sleep. Don't leave your four-legged friends behind - this is a pet-friendly hotel! Start your day with a complimentary hot (and delicious) breakfast, or head to the fitness center for a revitalizing workout. If you'd like to explore the area, this hotel places you near all major expressways that can take you to the airport, Doral, Downtown Miami and the beautiful beaches. description: Surround yourself with world class shopping, decadent dining and electrifying entertainment venues at Hotel Colonnade Coral Gables, Autograph Collection. Our luxury hotel flaunts an ideal location along Miracle Mile near the area's most popular destinations including University of Miami, Watsco Center, Marlins Park as well as Little Havana. Boasting vaulted ceilings, a grand staircase and sparkling chandeliers, our spectacular hotel lobby sets the scene for our stylishly designed accommodations. Unpack in spacious rooms and suites with wood floors, sectional sofas, modern decor and deluxe amenities before relaxing on a canopy bed with plush, pillow-top mattresses and luxurious linens. In your free time, maintain your wellness routine at our hotel's fitness center, play a round of billiards in our game room or soak up the sunshine next to our gorgeous rooftop pool. From our boutique accommodations to intuitive amenities, Hotel Colonnade Coral Gables, Autograph Collection will entice your sense of enjoyment.Marriott

You can also spend time on your room's balcony or patio, and sip cocktails and savor fresh seafood at our in-house restaurant. Rising 27 stories over fashionable Collins Ave and a brilliant white-sand beach, our luxury hotel resides at the intersection of art, fashion and design. Prestigious Forbes Five-Star and AAA Five-Diamond accolades set the stage for unparalleled service and amenities. Step into spacious guest rooms and suites with direct ocean views from expansive private balconies. Then, luxuriate in superb resort amenities including 14,000 square feet of indulgence at The Spa at St. Regis, Oceanfront Day Villas and gourmet dining options. An oasis of pampering and privilege at the northern tip of Miami Beach, FL, Bal Harbour is one of the most distinguished addresses in South Florida, and our hotel has long been a favorite destination for jet-setting travelers worldwide.Marriott

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami - Airport West
description: The Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami - Airport West hotel in Florida is located minutes from the Miami International Airport and Downtown Miami, close to numerous office buildings and industrial parks in the Doral area. The Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami - Airport West hotel in Florida features 86 two-room suites and 34 studio suites. We also feature 4 very spacious two bedroom suites with 2 bathrooms. All suites have a fully-equipped kitchen with granite countertops and wood floors, full-size refrigerator, range, microwave oven, coffee maker, two phones with data ports, high-speed internet access, HBO, iron and ironing board and a hair dryer. The Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami Airport West Florida hotel has a first-class business center that is complimentary to guest and accessible 24 hours a day. Enjoy a complimentary Suite Start hot breakfast seven days a week, Welcome Home Reception featuring light meal and drinks every Wednesday evening, and a Suite Shop snacks and sundries are also available 24 hours at this Miami Florida hotel. Spa services from neuromuscular therapy to body rituals, skin care treatments, and pedicures as well as a salon are offered. Bathrobes and slippers add comfort to each suite. A flat-screen TV, free WiFi, and a fully equipped kitchenette with granite counters are featured. The bathroom is spa-inspired, tiled with Italian glass and stone flooring. Boasting 4 pools and 4 hot tubs, Carillon also has over 40 fitness classes available each day. A cycling and walking trail surrounds the property, and a rock-climbing wall is featured on site. The Strand Bar and Grill restaurant features seasonal cuisine, ocean views, and floor-to-ceiling windows as well as an outdoor patio. The Cabana services light fare with cocktails, and The Corner Store serves juice. Premium shopping at the Lincoln Road Mall is 4.8 mi away, and the La Gorce Golf Course is 6 minutes' drive from the hotel. Within 20 minutes' drive of the hotel are Jungle Island, the Art Deco District, and the Greater Miami Convention and Visitors Bureau.

description: Hampton Inn Miami Dadeland hotel is located off 70th Ave.-Dadeland in the prestigious shopping district of Dadeland. We are 10 miles south of Miami International Airport and 4 miles west of Tamiami Executive Airport. Dadeland/Miami, Florida area attractions include shopping malls, historical sites, Viscaya Museum, Fairchild Garden, Metro Zoo and the University of Miami. Within.5 mile you can dine at Benihana, Cheesecake Factory, Johnny rockets, or Mandarin Express. Our Hampton Inn Miami Dadeland hotel of Florida features 5-stories with interior corridors in a Mediterranean style, 131 hotel rooms, heated hotel pool and whirlpool, meeting room that accommodates 25 people and state-of-the-art business center. Amenities you will find at our Hampton Inn Miami Dadeland hotel of Florida include complimentary continental breakfast, in-room coffeemaker and TV with cable. We also offer connecting hotel rooms, cribs, hair dryers, irons, and refrigerators. Laundry/valet services, audio visual equipment, and meeting/banquet facilities are available at Hampton Inn Miami Dadeland hotel of Florida for a nominal fee. We love having you here at the Hampton Inn Miami Dadeland hotel in Florida.Hilton

name: Edition Miami Beach
description: With luxury hotel accommodations and an oceanfront setting, The Miami Beach EDITION is an ideal escape. Local venues and iconic attractions, including Miami Beach Convention Center, the Fillmore and Perez Art Museum Miami, are minutes away. Return from the beach and experience exceptional dining at our restaurants developed by Michelin-starred Chef Jean-Georges Vongerichten. This Miami Beach hotel boasts two ocean-facing pools, a wellness spa with a gym, a nightclub, a bowling alley and an ice-skating rink, as well as chic indoor and outdoor event space. Decorated in sophisticated style, every hotel room features large windows and views of the city, pool or ocean. Unwind from the Miami Beach scene in your pet-friendly room that showcases plush bedding, a marble bathroom, a desk and free Wi-Fi. Revel in the living and dining areas of our oceanfront suites, ideal for entertaining family and friends. Our luxury bungalows promote a sense of privacy and well-being with their plunge pools and serene terraces.Marriott

name: The Standard Spa Miami Beach
description: Featuring a full-service spa, this adult-only Miami Beach hotel also features rooms with a view of the lush gardens, Biscayne Bay, and outdoor infinity pool. Guests will be 12 minutes' walk to Lincoln Road Mall and 5 minutes' drive to South Beach. The spa amenities, which are complimentary to hotel guests, include a Turkish Hamam with heated marble, hemlock sauna, eucalyptus steam room, ice room, hot tub, cold plunge and gym are also on site. Massages, facials, manicures, pedicures, and full-body scrubs are offered as well at the Spa of The Standard Miami Beach, located in South Florida. The restaurant, Lido Bayside Grill, uses locally sourced ingredients and seasonal produce, with a global-inspired menu including expertly-grilled dishes, fried options, and chilled dishes. There is also an indoor healthy cafe restaurant and speakeasy-style bar and lounge. In addition to a bicycle hire and a private boat dock, guests can enjoy paddle boarding and kayaks. Miami International Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Miami Airport West
description: The Hilton Garden Inn Miami Airport West hotel is conveniently located near the Miami International Airport. This Hilton Garden Inn hotel is just minutes away from all area major corporations and attractions including the Miami Cruise Port, South Beach and the Art Deco District, Downtown Miami, and the Doral Business Park. Guest rooms have features designed with you in mind, including: Great American Grill serving breakfast, lunch, dinner, and evening room service, 24-hour Pavilion Pantry convenience mart, Complimentary airport transportation, The Garden Sleep System bed, with non-allergenic feather pillows and duvet cover, In-room Cuisinart coffee maker, microwave, and mini-refrigerator, 32-inch high-definition, flat-screen TV with premium channels and Lodgenet movies, Complimentary high-speed wired and wireless Internet with remote printing provided by PrinterOn, in all guestrooms, Flexible workspace with Ergonomic Mirra Desk Chair, USA Today delivered Monday-Friday, Fitness center with cardio equipment, free weights and whirlpool, Outdoor heated pool. The hotel is a place for your events and meetings - Leave the details to the hotel event professionals: Dedicated sales team to focus on the details, Intimate function rooms with state-of-the-art technology, Business center with fax, print, and copying services. The hotel is close to corporations, government facilities, and local attractions, including: 1.5 miles from Cisco Systems, 1 mile from FedEx, 1.5 miles from General Electric, 3 miles from Oracle, 4 miles from 3M, 12 miles to Miami Beach, 9 miles to the Port of Miami. ***** Everything. Right where you need it. *****Hilton

description: TownePlace Suites Miami Lakes Hotel offers all-suite extended stay accommodations. Our hotel is convenient to Opa Locka Airport (OPA) and Miami International Airport (MIA) near world-class restaurants, Premier shopping, Hard Rock Stadium, and several golf courses. Enjoy one of our many studio or two bedroom suites, all with fully-equipped kitchens, ample work space and comfortable bedding. Relax and enjoy the amenities that are ideal for short or extended-stays, including a complimentary hot breakfast daily, free high-speed Internet access, personalized voicemail, on-site business services and 24-hour staffing. A 24-hour guest laundry is also available at the hotel, Maintain your fitness routine in the hotel's exercise room or relax and unwind in the outdoor pool, or use the outdoor grill to fire up your meal. Your stay will be relaxing and productive at Towneplace Suites Miami Lakes, so sit back, relax and stay a while.Marriott

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami Downtown/Brickell
description: Located within walking distance of the downtown Brickell Financial District, Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami Downtown/Brickell is near a variety of restaurants, bars and nightlife. You’ll enjoy easy access to I-95 and the Miami International Airport from our extended stay hotel. Tour the nearby Vizcaya Museum & Gardens, a National Historic Landmark, or take your family for a fun day at the Miami Seaquarium located on Virginia Key and nearby Key Biscayne. Unwind in a spacious studio or one-bedroom suite. Our accommodations offer seating and sleeping areas, fully equipped kitchens, complimentary internet access and sofa beds. One-bedroom suites offer separate living areas and bedrooms, and a few rooms have partial views of Miami and the Bay. Join us each morning for a complimentary hot full breakfast, and enjoy dinner with drinks* after a busy day on Wednesday evenings. Stock up on snacks, beverages, meals and travel essentials at the 24-hour Suite Shop®. Relax on our second floor pool deck overlooking downtown Miami, and cool down with a swim in the covered outdoor swimming pool. Both the fitness gym and business center are open 24 hours. For business or social events, our downtown Miami/Brickell hotel accommodates up to 50 guests in a meeting room offering natural lighting. *Subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.Hilton

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Miami Sunny Isles Beach

description: Soak up revitalizing sunshine, ocean breezes and stunning views at Residence Inn Miami Sunny Isles Beach, a hotel near Fort Lauderdale International Airport. Our extended-stay all suites hotel is directly across from the stunning white sands of Sunny Isles Beach and close to North Miami Beach’s fashion-forward shopping and entertainment. Our complimentary buffet breakfast energizes you for a fun-filled day in Sunny Isles Beach and free high-speed internet lets you search for fun things to do near the hotel. Cool off in our rooftop pool offering incredible views of the Miami Beach shoreline and blue skies before returning to your hotel suite. All pet-friendly suites at the hotel feature the amenities you need to cook a full meal, stretch out, sleep peacefully and work comfortably. Plus, with the proximity to Fort Lauderdale International Airport, our hotel near Oleta River State Park gives you easy access to both natural beauty and convenient travel options during your stay.Marriott

The suites at The Savoy Hotel include tea and coffee-making facilities. Each suite also provides a spacious seating area. Secluded in a 2-acre courtyard, the Hotel Savoy includes a restaurant that serves American cuisine indoors or outside on the patio. Breakfast, lunch and dinner are available. Guests can relax on the raised sun decks that overlook the ocean at the hotel. Lummus Park is within a 5-minute walk from Savoy Hotel. Marjory Stoneman Douglas Ocean Beach Park is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Newport Beachside Hotel & Resort
address: 16701 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: No description found

name: Beacon Hotel South Beach
description: Located on lively Ocean Drive in Miami Beach's Art Deco District, this hotel features an on-site restaurant and free continental breakfast. Rooms include free Wi-Fi. Lummus Beach is across the street. A flat-screen cable TV and an iPod dock are provided in all bright-colored rooms at Beacon Hotel. A small refrigerator, beach towels, and beach chairs are also provided. The Place serves Mediterranean dishes, including fresh Florida seafood, for lunch and dinner with both casual patio and indoor seating. The lobby bar is open all day. name: La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Miami Airport East

description: Just 20 minutes from Dolphin Stadium, the La Quinta Inn & Suites Miami Airport East is near all of your favorite attractions and only a mile from Miami International Airport (free shuttle service). We are just minutes from the Sports Complex (American Airlines Arena, Marlins Park, and Doral Golf & Resort). In less than 15 minutes, reach famed South Beach, Coconut Grove, beautiful Bayside, and the Miami Beach Convention Center. You will find plenty of great eateries within walking distance as well as shopping at Dolphin Mall and the Merchandise Mart. Great service begins mornings at the La Quinta Inn Miami Airport East, with a complimentary Free Bright Side BreakfastTM in the lobby. name: Hotel Aka Brickell
description: The following services and amenities are available, but with reduced service: Fitness Center, Breakfast, On-site Restaurant(s), Pool, Room Service, Valet Parking.The following services and amenities are currently not available: Business Center, Concierge, Spa.Decidedly modern, boldly conceived, and beautifully designed, this luxury hotel creates a unique sensory experience for its guests. The 203 guest rooms and 103 residence suites were stylishly created with a sophisticated traveler in mind, combining some of the finest services with high-tech facilities. Located in a concave building of glittering glass and steel, AKA Hotel Brickell features a minimalist and contemporary design, in the of heart Miami's business district. Our Brickell Avenue address provides guests with easy access to many area attractions, including South Beach, Coconut Grove and Key Biscayne, and is just 15 minutes from Miami International Airport. Overlooking the sparkling Biscayne Bay and within walking distance to a myriad of shopping and dining destinations, you couldn't be better placed. As perfectly formed as the Miami skyline, this sleek downtown luxury hotel offers an array of room options, including guest rooms, studios, and one and two bedroom residence suites. Capturing a sense of understated elegance, and accessorized with complementary elements of glass, wood, leather and metal, AKA Hotel Brickell welcomes you to experience the city's innate sense of style and flair. Experience a symphony of International flavors and style at Level 25 - Miami's only restaurant and lounge, 25 stories in the sky. Discover how world-class vintages of The Wine Attic pair perfectly with Atrio's progressive, global fare. After, whet your palate with a creative cocktail at The Bar, while sharing savory Spanish pintxos, perfectly executed with an innovative twist. Elevate your nose for wine with a fine selection of wines by the glass and personalized attention of our on-staff sommelier.FarePortal

name: Novotel Miami Brickell
description: Discover a tranquil retreat two blocks from the heart of the Financial District at Novotel Miami Brickell, one of the best hotels in Brickell Miami. Featuring a lobby design inspired by the city's beachfront culture and colors, our contemporary Downtown Miami hotel is adjacent to Simpson Park, a preserved swath of hardwood forest. Sweeping views of the tree canopy, framed by skyscrapers and sparkling Biscayne Bay, give our rooftop pool and bar the feel of a tropical resort.accorhotels.com

name: Holiday Inn Port Of Miami-Downtown
description: Enjoy your stay near the Port of Miami The Holiday Inn Port of Miami-Downtown is the perfect place to stay for your next trip to Miami. Located just six minutes from the Port of Miami, our hotel is close to all the major attractions in the city. Within walking distance of our hotel, you'll find Bayside Marketplace, the Kaseya Center, & the American Airlines Arena. Bayside Marketplace is a must-visit for any shopper, with over 150 stores and restaurants. The Kaseya Center is a hub for technology and innovation, and the American Airlines Arena is home to the Miami Heat basketball team. The Metromover station behind our hotel makes it easy to get around Downtown Miami & Brickell. The Metromover is a free elevated train that connects major points of interest in the area. After a long day of exploring, return to our hotel to relax in our modern accommodations. Our rooms are spacious and comfortable, with free Wi-Fi, blackout shades, HDTVs with streaming capabilities, & a mini fridge. We offer specials & packages designed to make your stay even more enjoyable, & we have a variety of onsite amenities. Downtown Miami is a vibrant & exciting place to be, & it's known for hosting a variety of special events throughout the year. Some of the most popular events include the ING & Mercedes-Benz Marathon, Market America, Miami Film Festival & Book Fair, Art Basel, & Ultra Music Fest. Whatever brings you to Miami, enjoy your stay at The Holiday Inn Port of Miami-Downtown.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Intercontinental Miami, An IHG Hotel
description: An iconic fixture on the downtown Miami skyline for 40 years, InterContinental Miami boasts a waterfront location on Biscayne Bay, steps away from arts and entertainment in Miami’s Brickell neighborhood. A beacon for both business and leisure travelers, the hotel rises 34 stories over the city with breathtaking views of the Atlantic Ocean, Biscayne Bay and the Port of Miami. The hotel, which recently completed a $40 million renovation, features 652 newly redefined luxury guest rooms.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Aloft Miami Dadeland
description: Open spaces, open thinking and open expression at Aloft Miami Dadeland. After your day of travel or business, mingle with family and friends over craft cocktails and light fare at the W XYZ® bar, or grab a snack from Re:fuel by Aloft, our 24-hour pantry. When you need a moment to yourself, retreat to the modern comfort of our pet-friendly rooms, with complimentary Wi-Fi, ergonomic workstations and plush bedding. Additionally, our plug and play connectivity station charges all of your electronics and links to the flat-panel TV to maximize work and play. For those hoping to stay in shape during their visit, we provide a 24-hour fitness center, as well as an outdoor pool. Complimentary self-parking is available for hotel guests. We offer complimentary shuttle service to/from Miami International Airport (to be scheduled/upon request) as well as shuttle service to the Port of Miami ($22 per person, 5 person minimum). Daily Housekeeping service available. Aloft Miami Dadeland offers an experience you won't forget!Marriott

name: The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne Miami
address: 455 Grand Bay Drive, Key Biscayne, FL 33149
description: Escape to a luxury Miami Beach resort that exudes the classic charm of South Florida. Located on an exclusive five-mile-long barrier island, The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne, Miami is just minutes from dynamic downtown, yet provides an atmosphere of sequestered serenity. With elegant architecture inspired by West Indies Colonial design, The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne, Miami is one of the finest beach hotels Miami, Florida has to offer.Marriott
